magical_items.name: Amulet of Eternal Flame
magical_items.description: A ruby amulet that glows with an inner fire, granting resistance to fire damage.

magical_items.name: Staff of Whispering Shadows
magical_items.description: A darkwood staff that murmurs secrets in the night. It can cast invisibility once per day.

magical_items.name: Ring of Boundless Vitality
magical_items.description: An emerald ring that enhances the wearer’s stamina, granting +2 to Constitution.

magical_items.name: Cloak of the Fallen Star
magical_items.description: A cloak shimmering like starlight that grants resistance to necrotic damage.

magical_items.name: Boots of Silent Passage
magical_items.description: Soft leather boots that muffle footsteps, allowing stealthy movement.

magical_items.name: Orb of Illusory Echoes
magical_items.description: A crystal orb that can project illusions of sounds from its surroundings.

magical_items.name: Elixir of Swift Healing
magical_items.description: A vial of sparkling blue liquid that restores 20 hit points when consumed.

magical_items.name: Lantern of the Luminous Path
magical_items.description: A lantern that casts a radiant light, revealing invisible creatures within its range.

magical_items.name: Pendant of True Sight
magical_items.description: A silver pendant that grants true sight for one minute once per day.

magical_items.name: Gauntlets of Ogre Strength
magical_items.description: Heavy gauntlets that grant the wearer an increased Strength of 19.

magical_items.name: Helm of the Stormcaller
magical_items.description: A steel helm that allows the wearer to cast thunderwave once per day.

magical_items.name: Belt of the Winter's Chill
magical_items.description: A fur-lined belt that grants resistance to cold damage.

magical_items.name: Bracers of Swift Deflection
magical_items.description: Leather bracers that provide a +1 bonus to Armor Class.

magical_items.name: Potion of Feathered Descent
magical_items.description: A potion that allows the drinker to fall slowly, as if under the effect of feather fall.

magical_items.name: Chalice of Fading Shadows
magical_items.description: A silver chalice that allows the drinker to become invisible for 10 minutes.

magical_items.name: Sword of the Eternal Frost
magical_items.description: A longsword that deals an extra 1d6 cold damage on hit.

magical_items.name: Cape of Elemental Harmony
magical_items.description: A colorful cape that provides resistance to one elemental damage type of the wearer’s choice per day.

magical_items.name: Ring of the Boundless Mind
magical_items.description: A silver ring that grants a +2 bonus to Intelligence.

magical_items.name: Stone of Recall
magical_items.description: A small stone that allows the user to teleport to a location they have previously marked.

magical_items.name: Bracelet of the Arcane Ward
magical_items.description: A bracelet that provides a protective shield, absorbing up to 10 damage once per day.

magical_items.name: Elixir of the Phoenix
magical_items.description: A rare elixir that revives the drinker from death with 1 hit point once per month.

magical_items.name: Dagger of Venomous Words
magical_items.description: A dagger that, when spoken to, can release a poisonous aura on hit.

magical_items.name: Shield of the Stone Sentinel
magical_items.description: A stone-crafted shield that grants resistance to bludgeoning damage.

magical_items.name: Mask of the Moonlit Thief
magical_items.description: A silver mask that enhances stealth and allows the wearer to see in darkness.

magical_items.name: Tome of Forgotten Knowledge
magical_items.description: A dusty book that grants +2 Wisdom upon reading, usable once per person.

magical_items.name: Horn of the Thunderous Charge
magical_items.description: A brass horn that can cast thunderous smite when blown.

magical_items.name: Necklace of the Deep
magical_items.description: A sapphire necklace that allows the wearer to breathe underwater and swim faster.

magical_items.name: Ring of the Watchful Eye
magical_items.description: A ring with an eye-shaped gem that grants advantage on perception checks.

magical_items.name: Robe of the Dream Weaver
magical_items.description: A robe that allows the wearer to cast sleep once per day.

magical_items.name: Wand of Eldritch Blasts
magical_items.description: A dark wand that can cast eldritch blast three times per day.
